name: Rcade Racer
description:
Rcade Racer brings the charme of oldschool arcade racing games right to you. 

You need to dodge the obstacles that will come your way. Either get your first highscore or beat your old ones. The game will save your latest highscore even if you close the game, so our game is a little bit more advanced than old arcade machines. 

Rcade Racer has the same fast and exciting gameplay you may know from this type of game. The longer you survive, the faster the obstacles get, so watch out and stay focused.

Gather your friends around your pc or let them download the game too and see who can get the best highscore.

Controlls: What you get in this game:
  • selfmade 3D assets
  • endless fun
  • oldschool arcade feeling
  • highscore system
  • random obstacle patterns
People who worked on this Game: 

L4J0
papermond
MoonKami
TheGreatKida
Sovala

We made 3D Assets, ui images, programmed all of it and either played with sound from We Love Indies or made them ourselfs. 

Musik and Sounds in this Project are from We Love Indies. 

Made as a Project for the htk academy GameJam Fire Edition 2022 with the theme Arcade.
